workflow.description: Adds an error message to a running list of errors, so that a parent workflow can move on and then process all of its errors at the end.

param.name: errorCode
param.description: Error message from the parent workflow

param.name: errorList
param.description: Object to track all errors in the parent workflow. Will be updated to include errorCode.

param.name: updatedErrorList
param.description: Object to track all errors in the parent workflow. Will be updated to include errorCode.

param.name: hasErrors
param.description: Will be True. Parent workflow should have a matching attribute to track if errors were encounted. Bind it to this.
